en: The accident caused a traffic jam.
zh: 那场事故导致了堵车。

en: The accident occurred on Friday.
zh: 事故是周五发生的。

en: We think that the narrow road was responsible for the accident.
zh: 我们觉得路太窄是造成事故的原因。

en: The accident happened a year ago today.
zh: 事故正好发生在去年的今天。

en: The accident was due to bad driving.
zh: 事故是因为开车技术太差。

en: The accident occurred in a remote place.
zh: 事故发生在一个很偏僻的地方。

en: The accident was due to the driver's carelessness.
zh: 事故是因为司机太粗心了。

en: The accident happened because of the driver's negligence.
zh: 事故是由于司机的疏忽造成的。

en: The accident was caused by the error on the part of the driver.
zh: 事故是司机失误造成的。

en: The accident is still vivid in his memory.
zh: 那场事故他到现在还记忆犹新。

en: Where did the accident take place?
zh: 事故是在哪儿发生的？

en: The accident took place at that corner.
zh: 事故发生在那个拐角。

en: The accident was due to the smog.
zh: 事故是因为雾霾太重。

en: The accident happened in this manner.
zh: 事故就是这么发生的。

en: The accident took place on the evening of last Sunday.
zh: 事故是上周日晚上发生的。

en: The accident is reported in today's paper.
zh: 今天的报纸上报道了那场事故。

en: The accident happened the day before yesterday.
zh: 事故是前天发生的。

en: When did the accident happen to her?
zh: 她是什么时候出的事？

en: When did the accident happen?
zh: 事故是什么时候发生的？

en: When did the accident take place?
zh: 事故什么时候发生的？

en: The accident took place at a crossroads.
zh: 事故发生在一个十字路口。

en: The accident happened on a rainy day.
zh: 事故发生在一个雨天。

en: The accident happened at that crossing.
zh: 事故发生在那个路口。

en: The accident happened two hours ago.
zh: 事故是两个小时前发生的。

en: The accident robbed him of his best friend.
zh: 那场事故夺走了他最好的朋友。

en: The news of the accident was a great shock to me.
zh: 事故的消息让我感到非常震惊。

en: He is to blame for the accident.
zh: 那场事故得怪他。

en: It is I that am responsible for the accident.
zh: 事故该由我负责。

en: The accident was due to the negligence of the caretaker.
zh: 事故是由于看管人的疏忽造成的。

en: It is he who is to blame for the accident.
zh: 事故该怪的人是他。

en: The accident was caused chiefly by the unpredictable weather.
zh: 事故主要是由于天气变化莫测造成的。

en: The picture of the accident makes me sick.
zh: 事故的照片看得我反胃。

en: I don't blame you for the accident; it was not your fault.
zh: 我不怪你，那场事故不是你的错。

en: Probe into the cause of the accident.
zh: 调查一下事故原因。

en: The toll from the accident was 5 persons dead and 100 persons injured.
zh: 事故造成了5人死亡，100人受伤。

en: Who is the victim of the accident?
zh: 事故的受害者是谁？

en: Please give me the details of the accident.
zh: 请告诉我事故的细节。

en: The news of the accident was sent out at once over the radio.
zh: 广播里立刻播报了事故的消息。

en: The news of the accident caused public alarm.
zh: 事故的消息引起了公众恐慌。

en: The accident deprived him of his sight.
zh: 事故让他双目失明了。

en: The traffic accident prevented me from catching the train.
zh: 交通事故害得我没赶上火车。

en: Soon after the accident they found a live animal there.
zh: 事故发生后不久，他们在那里发现了一只活着的动物。

en: Just to think about the accident makes me shudder.
zh: 一想到那场事故我就不寒而栗。

en: She said she had heard of the accident.
zh: 她说她听说了那场事故。

en: You must bring the person who is immediately concerned with the accident.
zh: 你得把和事故直接相关的人找来。

en: He is responsible for the accident.
zh: 他要对这起事故负责。

en: It is you that are responsible for the accident.
zh: 事故该由你负责。

en: We were faced with an unusual situation because of the accident.
zh: 因为那场事故，我们面临着一个不寻常的情况。

en: I explained the accident to him.
zh: 我跟他解释了事故的经过。

en: Dare you ask him about the accident?
zh: 你敢问他关于那场事故的事吗？

en: I asked him about the accident.
zh: 我问了他关于那次事故的事。

en: I couldn't but sympathize with the girl who had lost her parents in the accident.
zh: 我忍不住同情那个在事故中失去双亲的女孩。

en: The man injured in the accident was taken to the hospital.
zh: 事故中受伤的那个人被送到了医院。

en: Some were injured and others were killed in the accident.
zh: 这次事故中，有人受伤，也有人遇难。

en: The passengers who were injured in the accident were taken to the nearest hospital.
zh: 事故中受伤的乘客被送到了最近的医院。

en: The accident bereaved her of her husband.
zh: 那场事故让她失去了丈夫。

en: The accident deprived them of their happiness.
zh: 这次事故夺走了他们的幸福。

en: He was injured in his left leg in the accident.
zh: 他在那场事故中左腿受伤了。

en: No blame attaches to him for the accident.
zh: 那场事故怪不到他头上。

en: It's a miracle that he wasn't killed in the accident.
zh: 他在那场事故中竟然没死，真是奇迹。

en: It is a pity that nobody was saved in the accident, isn't it?
zh: 事故里没一个人获救，真遗憾，是吧？

en: The accident has caused many deaths.
zh: 这次事故造成了很多人死亡。

en: Many lives were lost in the accident.
zh: 许多人在那场事故中丧命了。

en: Many people were killed in the accident.
zh: 很多人在那场事故中遇难了。

en: A lot of passengers were injured in the accident.
zh: 很多乘客在事故中受伤了。

en: The news that her son was injured in the accident was a great shock to her.
zh: 得知儿子在事故中受伤的消息，她受了很大的打击。

en: We were not to blame for the accident.
zh: 那场事故不该怪我们。

en: Only one person survived the accident.
zh: 那场事故中只有一个人幸存。

en: Several thousand people were deprived of transportation by the accident.
zh: 事故导致好几千人没法坐车了。

en: Twelve people were injured in the accident.
zh: 十二个人在事故中受伤了。

en: Fifteen people were killed or injured in the accident.
zh: 事故中共有十五人伤亡。

en: The accident threw traffic into great confusion.
zh: 那场事故让交通变得一团糟。

en: The accident stopped the traffic.
zh: 事故导致交通中断了。

en: How many people were killed in the store?
zh: 店里有多少人遇难了？

en: As a result of the accident, several passengers were killed.
zh: 事故导致几名乘客遇难。

en: No passengers were killed in the accident.
zh: 事故中没有乘客遇难。

en: You are to blame for the accident.
zh: 那场事故是你的错。

en: Few passengers got injured in the accident.
zh: 事故中几乎没有乘客受伤。

en: The bus was delayed an hour by the accident.
zh: 因为那场事故，公交车晚点了一个小时。

en: Ten people were killed or injured in the accident.
zh: 事故中有十个人伤亡。

en: A number of passengers were injured in the accident.
zh: 事故中有些乘客受伤了。

en: Quite a few people were injured in the accident.
zh: 事故中不少人都受伤了。

en: There were fifteen persons injured in the accident.
zh: 事故中有十五人受伤。

en: Ten people were injured in the accident.
zh: 十个人在事故中受伤了。

en: Ten people were slightly injured in the accident.
zh: 十个人在事故中受了轻伤。

en: The accident almost cost him his life.
zh: 那场事故差点要了他的命。

en: The accident caused traffic confusion.
zh: 事故造成了交通混乱。

en: Almost all of the passenger in the bus were asleep when the accident happened.
zh: 事故发生时，车上几乎所有的乘客都在睡觉。

en: He had been working in the factory for three years when the accident occurred.
zh: 事故发生的时候，他在那家工厂已经干了三年了。

en: It is a complete mystery what caused the accident.
zh: 事故起因完全是个谜。

en: Confusion arose from the accident.
zh: 事故引发了一片混乱。

en: You have only to read this article to see how serious the accident was.
zh: 你只要读读这篇文章，就知道那场事故有多严重了。

en: I'll ask him how the accident happened.
zh: 我会去问他事故是怎么发生的。

en: No one knew for certain how the accident happened.
zh: 没人确切知道事故是怎么发生的。

en: It is difficult for me to handle the case.
zh: 对我来说，处理这个案子很棘手。

en: Put the case in the hands of the police.
zh: 把这案子交给警察处理吧。

en: The event has become known to the public.
zh: 这件事已经传开了。

en: The accident happened under his nose.
zh: 事故就在他眼皮子底下发生了。

en: That incident harmed his reputation.
zh: 那件事损害了他的名声。

en: The incident left a spot on his reputation.
zh: 那件事成了他名声上的一个污点。

en: The event affected his future.
zh: 这件事影响了他的前途。

en: They are inquiring into the matter.
zh: 他们正在调查这件事。

en: The event was forgotten in progress of time.
zh: 随着时间的流逝，这件事渐渐被淡忘了。

en: The incident took place at midnight.
zh: 那件事发生在半夜。

en: That matter was decided by the Supreme Court.
zh: 那件事是由最高法院裁决的。

en: The matter was brought into court.
zh: 那件事闹到了法庭上。

en: The affair is still wrapped in mystery.
zh: 这件事至今仍是个谜。

en: The event is worthy of remembrance.
zh: 这件事值得纪念。

en: The event is still fresh in our memory.
zh: 那件事我们还记忆犹新。

en: The incident gave a shock to the whole school.
zh: 那件事震惊了全校。

en: That event happened 15 years ago.
zh: 那件事是15年前发生的。

en: Please keep me informed of the development of the case.
zh: 案子有进展请随时告诉我。

en: The explanation of the event was omitted for lack of space.
zh: 由于篇幅有限，关于那件事的解释被删掉了。

en: We expect an early settlement of the affair.
zh: 我们希望这件事能早点解决。

en: I do remember the incident quite well.
zh: 我确实记得很清楚。

en: Who will try the case?
zh: 谁来审这个案子？

en: The incident was never brought to my notice.
zh: 没人跟我提过那件事。

en: A reward has been offered for information pertaining to the incident.
zh: 提供关于那件事的消息是有奖金的。

en: That incident put his courage to the test.
zh: 那件事考验了他的勇气。

en: There was something weird about the incident.
zh: 那件事有点蹊跷。

en: I will tell of the incident.
zh: 我会把那件事讲出来的。

en: I'm not at liberty to tell you about the incident.
zh: 那件事我不方便告诉你。

en: Her account of the incident accords with yours.
zh: 她对那件事的描述跟你说的一样。

en: He backed us up during that incident.
zh: 在那件事里他挺身而出支持了我们。

en: The scandal separated him from his friend.
zh: 那场丑闻让他和朋友绝交了。

en: The matter made his name known.
zh: 这件事让他出了名。

en: The incident prevented him from going to America.
zh: 那件事让他没去成美国。

en: That incident drew his interest.
zh: 那件事引起了他的兴趣。

en: The businessman withdrew from the transaction.
zh: 那个商人退出了这笔交易。

en: The incident sowed the seeds of the war.
zh: 那件事埋下了战争的种子。

en: The business will pay in due course.
zh: 这生意以后会赚钱的。

en: The business will yields a fair return on the investment.
zh: 这笔投资会有不错的回报。

en: The undertaking entailed great expense upon the government.
zh: 那个项目让政府花了一大笔钱。

en: The enterprise was doomed to failure.
zh: 那个项目注定要失败。

en: The undertaking was a failure from the beginning.
zh: 这项目从一开始就是个失败。

en: The fact is, I think, very important.
zh: 我觉得这个事实非常重要。

en: The business hasn't been paying for the last six months.
zh: 这半年来这生意一直不赚钱。

en: The total expense for the project amounts to one hundred million yen.
zh: 这个项目的总花费达到了一亿日元。

en: Who will provide capital for the venture?
zh: 谁来给这个项目投钱？

en: You mustn't tell that to your parents.
zh: 你千万别把这事儿告诉你爸妈。

en: Your success in the enterprise depends on your effort.
zh: 事业能否成功全看你够不够努力。

en: Don't keep me in the dark about it.
zh: 这事儿别瞒着我。

en: Nobody but John has heard of it.
zh: 除了约翰，没别人听说过这事。

en: Put that in writing.
zh: 把它白纸黑字写下来。

en: The mere thought of it is enough to make me happy.
zh: 只要一想到这事我就挺开心的。

en: I make little of the problem.
zh: 我觉得这问题没什么大不了的。

en: Are you quite certain about it?
zh: 你真的确定吗？

en: I dare say you're right about that.
zh: 我敢说你是对的。

en: You may not have heard about this.
zh: 你可能还没听说过这件事。

en: I must confer with my colleagues on the matter.
zh: 我得跟我同事商量一下这件事。

en: I can't disagree with you on that.
zh: 这点我没法不同意你。

en: I have nothing to tell you about it.
zh: 这事儿我没什么好跟你说的。

en: I had to get rid of my doubt about it.
zh: 我得打消对这事儿的疑虑。

en: It is no use arguing with him about it.
zh: 跟他争这事儿没用。

en: We elected her to approach our teacher on the matter.
zh: 我们选她去跟老师谈这事儿。

en: That destroyed all his dreams.
zh: 那毁了他所有的梦想。

en: The dentist will see you only by appointment.
zh: 看牙医得先预约。

en: The hen has been brooding its eggs for a week.
zh: 母鸡已经孵了一个星期的蛋了。

en: Our department doesn't have that information.
zh: 我们部门没有那方面的信息。

en: How about going to see the game?
zh: 去看比赛怎么样？

en: I don't particularly want to see the game.
zh: 我不是特别想看比赛。

en: The game starts at two tomorrow afternoon.
zh: 比赛明天下午两点开始。

en: The game was called off.
zh: 比赛取消了。

en: The game was canceled because of the heavy rain.
zh: 比赛因为大雨取消了。

en: The game was put off until next Sunday.
zh: 比赛推迟到下周日了。

en: What time does the game start?
zh: 比赛几点开始？

en: The game was called off on account of rain.
zh: 比赛因为下雨取消了。

en: The game was put off because of the rain.
zh: 比赛因为下雨推迟了。

en: The game resulted in a draw.
zh: 比赛打成了平局。

en: The game was suspended.
zh: 比赛暂停了。

en: The game was looked forward to by everyone.
zh: 大家都非常期待这场比赛。

en: The game was very exciting.
zh: 比赛非常精彩。

en: The game got more and more exciting.
zh: 比赛越来越精彩了。

en: The game was slow, and it was also boring.
zh: 比赛节奏很慢，而且很无聊。

en: The game was excellent.
zh: 比赛非常棒。

en: The game ended in a draw with a score 6-6.
zh: 比赛最后以6比6打平了。

en: The game was called off because of the rain.
zh: 比赛因为下雨取消了。

en: The final score of the game was 3 to 1.
zh: 比赛最后比分是3比1。

en: The latter half of the game was very exciting.
zh: 比赛下半场非常精彩。

en: The game made him excited.
zh: 比赛让他很兴奋。

en: Great was our delight when we won the game.
zh: 赢了比赛我们特别高兴。

en: Anyone can participate in the game, no matter what nationality they are.
zh: 不管国籍是什么，谁都能参加比赛。

en: The game exhausted me.
zh: 这场比赛累死我了。

en: I'll never forget taking the exam.
zh: 我永远忘不了那次考试。

en: Those who missed the test must take it tomorrow.
zh: 没参加考试的人明天必须补考。

en: The examination was not difficult in the least.
zh: 考试一点儿都不难。

en: The exam was too difficult for me.
zh: 考试对我来说太难了。

en: The exam was divided into two parts.
zh: 考试分成了两部分。

en: The result of the examination fell short of our expectations.
zh: 考试结果不如我们的预期。

en: He was happy to have passed the examination.
zh: 他很高兴通过了考试。

en: The attempt ended in failure for want of support.
zh: 这次尝试因为缺乏支持而失败了。

en: I cannot help feeling that the attempt has turned out to be a failure.
zh: 我忍不住觉得这次尝试已经失败了。

en: The poet searches for the beauty in life.
zh: 诗人寻找生活中的美。

en: The poet always takes account of humanism before everything.
zh: 这位诗人总是把人文主义放在首位。

en: The poet attempted to commit suicide in his study.
zh: 这位诗人试图在书房里自杀。

en: The poet committed suicide in his study.
zh: 这位诗人在书房里自杀了。

en: The poet compared death to sleep.
zh: 诗人把死亡比作睡眠。

en: The poet has been writing poems since this morning.
zh: 诗人从今天早上起就一直在写诗。

en: The poet was no richer than a beggar.
zh: 这个诗人穷得跟乞丐没两样。

en: The poet wrote many poems.
zh: 这位诗人写了很多诗。

en: The poet lived here twenty years odd.
zh: 这个诗人在这里住了二十多年。

en: The poet is not used to speaking in public.
zh: 那个诗人不习惯在公开场合讲话。

en: It was while I was in Hokkaido that I first met the poet.
zh: 我是在北海道的时候第一次见到那个诗人的。

en: The poet and novelist were both present at the meeting.
zh: 诗人跟小说家都出席了那个会议。

en: As the poet says, a little learning is a dangerous thing.
zh: 就像诗人说的，一知半解是很危险的。

en: It was clear what the poet wanted to say.
zh: 诗人想表达的意思很清楚。

en: It took me an hour to learn the poem by heart.
zh: 我花了一个小时才把这首诗背下来。

en: Read the poem several times and digest it.
zh: 这首诗多读几遍，好好领会一下。

en: The poem was composed by an anonymous author.
zh: 这首诗是一位匿名作者写的。

en: Have you learned the poem by heart?
zh: 这首诗你背下来了吗？

en: The poem worked on her heart.
zh: 这首诗触动了她的心。

en: The poem tells the story of the deeds of gods.
zh: 这首诗讲的是众神的事迹。

en: We are familiar with the poem.
zh: 我们对这首诗很熟悉。

en: That poem mixes prose with poetry.
zh: 那首诗把散文和诗歌混在了一起。

en: Fold the paper in four.
zh: 把纸折成四折。

en: How does the paper feel?
zh: 这纸摸着怎么样？

en: Fold the paper in the middle.
zh: 把纸从中间对折。

en: The branch bent but did not break.
zh: 树枝弯了，但没断。

en: The explosion reduced the facilities to ruins.
zh: 爆炸把那些设施炸成了一片废墟。

en: The payment will be deferred for two years.
zh: 付款将推迟两年。

en: The manager gave the precise answer which I was looking for.
zh: 经理给出的答案正是我想要的。

en: You must not part with the ring.
zh: 这枚戒指你千万别弄丢了。

en: The ring was nowhere to be found.
zh: 那枚戒指哪儿也找不着。

en: The ring has a diamond in it.
zh: 那枚戒指上镶着钻。

en: The director became really anxious at this second postponement.
zh: 再次推迟让导演变得非常焦虑。

en: I jumped at the unexpected news.
zh: 听到那个意外的消息，我吓了一跳。

en: The applicant impressed the examiner favorably.
zh: 申请人给考官留下了很好的印象。

en: The mayor is sensitive to the way his programs have been criticized.
zh: 市长对他那些项目遭受的批评很敏感。

en: The mayor appropriated city money for his own use.
zh: 市长挪用公款私用。

en: That market has been rapidly expanding.
zh: 那个市场一直在飞速扩张。

en: Take another good look at the city map.
zh: 再仔细看一遍城市地图。

en: The city has a population of about four million.
zh: 这个城市大约有四百万人口。

en: The city has decided to do away with the streetcar.
zh: 市里决定取消有轨电车。

en: The city was restored to tranquility after a week.
zh: 一周后，城市恢复了平静。

en: The city lies east of London.
zh: 那个城市在伦敦以东。

en: The city was soon occupied by the soldiers.
zh: 那座城市很快就被士兵占领了。

en: The defenses of the city are strong.
zh: 那个城市的防御很坚固。

en: The city is on the eastern bank of the Hudson.
zh: 这座城市在哈德逊河东岸。

en: The population of the city is about 100,000.

en: That job gave him little gratification.
zh: 那份工作让他没什么成就感。

en: If the work is to be completed before June, more people will have to make more effort.
zh: 要是想在六月前干完，大家得再加把劲。

en: It is impossible for me to finish the work in a day.
zh: 我不可能一天之内干完这活儿。

en: I found it impossible to do the job in a day.
zh: 我发现一天之内根本干不完这活儿。

en: I finished the work in less than an hour.
zh: 我不到一小时就把活儿干完了。

en: The job looked quite simple, but it took me a week.
zh: 这活儿看着挺简单的，结果花了我一个星期。

en: Will the work be finished by tomorrow?
zh: 明天之前能干完吗？

en: The job earns him half a million yen every month.
zh: 这份工作让他每个月能赚五十万日元。

en: The work will tax his health.
zh: 这活儿太损他身体了。

en: The task is of great importance to them.
zh: 这任务对他们来说特别重要。

en: The load of his work was too great for him.
zh: 他的工作量太大了，他吃不消。

en: Was the work done by him alone?
zh: 这活儿是他一个人干的吗？

en: The work has been almost completed.
zh: 活儿快干完了。

en: I will have finished the work by noon.
zh: 中午之前我就能把活儿干完。

en: I got nowhere with the work.
zh: 我这活儿一点进展都没有。

en: The work was done with great haste.
zh: 这活儿干得挺仓促的。

en: The work is well worth the trouble.
zh: 费这番功夫干这活儿挺值的。

en: The job pays well, but on the other hand I have to work twelve hours a day.
zh: 钱是挺多，但另一方面，我每天得干12个小时。

en: I'm through with my work. Let's go out.
zh: 我活儿干完了，咱们出去转转吧。

en: The work is done.
zh: 活儿干完了。

en: The job is not suitable for young girls.
zh: 这份工作不适合年轻小姑娘。

en: The work is a heavy tax on my health.
zh: 这活儿太伤身体了。

en: This task is impossible for me to accomplish.
zh: 这任务我没法儿完成。

en: The work is easy enough for me to finish in a couple of hours.
zh: 这活儿挺容易的，我两小时就能干完。

en: The work had been completed before I arrived.
zh: 我到之前，活儿就已经干完了。

en: I finished the work yesterday.
zh: 我昨天把活儿干完了。

en: The job will take a minimum of ten days.
zh: 这活儿最少得干十天。

en: That work will be finished at the end of this week.
zh: 那活儿这周末就能干完。

en: You may as well do the task now as put it off.
zh: 与其拖着，你还不如现在就把这事儿给做了。

en: The work is now in progress.
zh: 活儿现在正干着呢。

en: The task was total agony.
zh: 这任务简直是种煎熬。

en: You will find the job easy.
zh: 你会发现这活儿挺容易的。

en: It seems the task will not be accomplished in our generation.
zh: 看来这事儿我们这辈子是完不成了。

en: Be sure to keep in mind that you're supposed to complete the work within a week.
zh: 记着啊，这活儿得在一周之内干完。

en: I'll get through the work in an hour.
zh: 我一个小时就能把活儿干完。

en: We brought off the task.
zh: 我们把这事儿搞定了。

en: The work is not finished yet.
zh: 活儿还没干完呢。

en: The job isn't anywhere near done.
zh: 这活儿还差得远呢。

en: That job is pretty much finished.
zh: 那活儿差不多干完了。

en: The work is practically finished.
zh: 活儿基本上干完了。

en: The work must be done by Tom.
zh: 这活儿必须得让汤姆来干。

en: The work calls for great patience.
zh: 这活儿得非常有耐心才行。

en: The work was very difficult.
zh: 这活儿当时挺难干的。

en: The work is actually finished.
zh: 这活儿其实已经干完了。

en: The work will take anywhere from two to three weeks.
zh: 这活儿大概得花两三周。

en: The work can't be done at a moment's notice.
zh: 这活儿哪能说干完就干完啊。

en: You cannot be too careful when you do the job.
zh: 干这活儿再怎么小心都不嫌多。

en: It's a good paying job, but the fly in the ointment is that I'll have to spend a lot of time traveling.
zh: 这份工作待遇不错，美中不足的是我得花很多时间在路上。

en: The work was well done in a way.
zh: 某种程度上说，这活儿干得挺好。

en: That job was not very interesting, but on the other hand it was well paid.
zh: 那工作虽然没啥意思，但话说回来，工资挺高的。

en: The task is so difficult that I cannot accomplish it.
zh: 这事儿太难了，我搞不定。

en: The work had been finished by six.
zh: 六点以前活儿就干完了。

en: The work will be finished at six.
zh: 活儿六点就能干完。

en: The job must be finished by 3 p.m.
zh: 这活儿下午三点前必须干完。

en: It appeared as if the work would not be finished in a year.
zh: 看着像是一年也干不完。

en: The task will be accomplished in a year.
zh: 这事儿一年就能办成。

en: The work cannot be done in a day.
zh: 这活儿不是一天就能干完的。

en: We cannot do the work in a day.
zh: 我们一天之内干不完这活儿。

en: The work requires ten men for ten days.
zh: 这活儿得十个人干十天。

en: The work cost 100 dollars.
zh: 这活儿花了一百块钱。

en: I don't remember getting paid for the work.
zh: 我不记得拿过这活儿的钱。

en: The accomplishment of the task took several years.
zh: 完成这个任务花了好几年。

en: The work cost him his life.
zh: 这活儿要了他的命。

en: There is no one here who can help you with the work.
zh: 这儿没人能帮你的忙。

en: That job brings him in an extra 60,000 yen a month.
zh: 那份工作让他每个月能多赚六万日元。

en: Three-quarters of the work was finished.
zh: 活儿已经干完四分之三了。

en: Two thirds of the work is finished.
zh: 活儿干完三分之二了。

en: The job drew out his talent.
zh: 这份工作发挥了他的才干。

en: The work will be a great tax on his time.
zh: 这活儿会占用他大量的时间。

en: It rests with you to decide whom to choose for the job.
zh: 选谁来干这活儿由你决定。

en: We must concentrate our efforts on the desk.
zh: 我们得集中精力干手头的活儿。

en: Please try me for the job.
zh: 让我试试这份工作吧。

en: It is up to you to apply for the job.
zh: 申不申请这份工作由你决定。

en: My heart wasn't in the work.
zh: 我心思没在工作上。

en: Why not apply for that job?
zh: 你干嘛不申请那份工作？

en: He is the proper person for the job.
zh: 他挺适合这工作的。

en: The work calls for patience.
zh: 这活儿需要耐心。

en: You'll soon get accustomed to the work.
zh: 你很快就会习惯这工作的。

en: No less than three hundred dollars was needed for the work.
zh: 做这活儿至少需要三百美元。

en: The business brings him in 8000 dollars a year.
zh: 这生意一年能让他赚八千美金。

en: We lost a lot on that job.
zh: 那次活儿我们亏了不少。

en: Did you make any money out of that business?
zh: 你那生意挣钱了吗？

en: That job took a lot out of me.
zh: 那份工作把我累坏了。

en: In the factory, all the equipment was up to date.
zh: 工厂里的设备都是最新的。

en: When the work was done, the men were discharged.
zh: 活儿干完后，工人们就解散了。

en: I've left that line of business.
zh: 我早就不干那行了。

en: Not that I dislike that job, but that I have no time to do it.
zh: 倒不是我不喜欢那份工作，只是我没时间做。

en: Not that I dislike the work, but that I have no time.
zh: 倒不是我不喜欢这活儿，只是没时间。

en: The cruel man beat the dog with a whip.
zh: 那个狠心的人用鞭子抽那条狗。

en: The industry is heavily dependent on government funding.
zh: 这个行业非常依赖政府资助。

en: The fire which caused the disaster broke out on the second floor of the hospital.
zh: 引起灾难的那场大火是从医院二楼烧起来的。

en: That terrorist was to blame for the disaster.
zh: 那场灾难该怪那个恐怖分子。

en: That forest fire happened from natural cause.
zh: 那场森林大火是自然原因引起的。

en: The forest fire occurred through carelessness.
zh: 那场森林大火是由于粗心大意引起的。

en: We call the mountain Tsurugidake.
zh: 我们管这山叫剑岳。

en: There is only one pass over the mountain.
zh: 翻过那座山只有一条路。

en: The mountain rises above the plain.
zh: 那座山耸立在平原之上。

en: The mountain is easy of access.
zh: 那座山挺容易上去的。

en: The mountain is covered with snow.
zh: 山上覆盖着雪。

en: The mountain is famous in myth and legend.
zh: 这座山在神话传说中很有名。

en: The mountains look nicer from a distance.
zh: 远看这些山会更好看。

en: The mountain is more than 3,000 meters above sea level.
zh: 这座山海拔三千多米。

en: The mountain is about 3000 meters above sea level.
zh: 这座山海拔大约三千米。

en: We have snow on the mountain all the year round.
zh: 山上一年到头都有雪。

en: The mountain is covered with snow all the year round.
zh: 这座山终年积雪。

en: How high is the mountain?
zh: 这座山有多高？

en: This mountain has an altitude of 3,000 meters.
zh: 这座山的海拔是三千米。

en: The mountain peak was covered with snow.
zh: 山尖上覆盖着白雪。

en: The mountain top is covered with snow almost all year.
zh: 山顶几乎全年都有积雪。

en: The top of the mountain is always covered with snow.
zh: 山顶总是盖着雪。

en: There was a tower on the top of the mountain.
zh: 山顶上曾有个塔。

en: The summit of the mountain is covered with snow.
zh: 山顶覆盖着积雪。

en: The view from the top of the mountain took my breath away.
zh: 山顶的景色美得让我窒息。

en: The mountain has a beautiful shape.
zh: 那座山的形状很美。

en: It's not absolutely impossible to climb the mountain.
zh: 爬上那座山也不是完全没可能。

en: The hill is bare of trees.
zh: 这座山上光秃秃的，没树。

en: Not a few monkeys were found in the mountain.
zh: 山里发现了不少猴子。

en: It's a lot of fun to climb that mountain.
zh: 爬那座山挺好玩的。

en: There are many monkeys on the mountain.
zh: 山上有好多猴子。

en: I met some hikers on the mountain.
zh: 我在山上遇到了几个徒步的人。

en: The three sisters look very much alike.
zh: 姐妹三个长得特别像。

en: The mountain is standing out in sharp relief against the blue sky.
zh: 衬着蓝天，那座山的轮廓清晰可见。

en: The plate is made of plastic.
zh: 这个盘子是塑料做的。

en: The magazine does nothing for me.
zh: 这杂志对我没什么吸引力。

en: Having read through the magazine, he lent it to me.
zh: 他看完这本杂志后借给了我。

en: Can I have a look at the magazine?
zh: 我能看看这本杂志吗？

en: I decided to subscribe to the magazine.
zh: 我决定订这本杂志了。

en: The magazine comes out every week.
zh: 这杂志每周出一期。

en: The magazines were sold out.
zh: 杂志卖光了。

en: The magazine revealed all his dirty secrets.
zh: 杂志把他的那些丑事全给抖出来了。

en: The magazine is enjoying great popularity.
zh: 这本杂志现在特别火。

en: The magazine comes out once a week.
zh: 这杂志一周出一期。

en: The magazine jumped the gun and reported on the scandal.
zh: 杂志抢先报道了那桩丑闻。

en: Where can I buy that magazine?
zh: 哪儿能买到那本杂志？

en: The magazine is for killing time.
zh: 这杂志就是用来打发时间的。

en: The magazine is issued twice a month.
zh: 这杂志一个月出两期。

en: The magazine is aimed at teenagers.
zh: 这本杂志是给青少年看的。

en: Would you lend me the latest issue of the magazine?
zh: 能把最新一期的杂志借给我吗？

en: The latest issue of the magazine will come out next Monday.
zh: 最新一期的杂志下周一出。

en: I got a premium for subscribing to the magazine.
zh: 我订这杂志还拿了个赠品。

en: The magazine article said that the value of the yen would rise.
zh: 杂志上的文章说日元要升值。

en: That magazine article exposed his devilish acts to the full light of day.
zh: 那篇杂志文章把他的恶行彻底曝光了。

en: The noise gets on my nerves.
zh: 这噪音吵得我心烦。

en: The murderer was finally caught last night.
zh: 凶手昨晚终于被抓住了。

en: The murderer is still at large.
zh: 凶手还没抓到。

en: The murderer is now on trial.
zh: 凶手现在正在受审。

en: There was no clue as to the identity of the murderer.
zh: 关于凶手的身份，一点线索都没有。

en: The murder case may bear a relation on his sudden death.
zh: 这桩谋杀案可能跟他的暴毙有关。

en: The murder remains a mystery.
zh: 这起谋杀案至今还是个谜。

en: The scene of the murder was too terrible to describe.
zh: 谋杀现场惨不忍睹。

en: Nobody seemed to have a motive for the murder.
zh: 好像谁都没有杀人动机。

en: The fence was not high enough to keep the wolves out.
zh: 栅栏不够高，挡不住狼。

en: I wrote the composition in haste, so it must be full of mistakes.
zh: 我这作文写得太匆忙，肯定到处都是错。

en: The work finally saw the light last month.
zh: 这部作品上个月终于面世了。

en: The work will give birth to a new school of novel.
zh: 这部作品将开启一个新的小说流派。

en: Finally her true talent revealed itself in that painting.
zh: 在那幅画里，她真正的才华终于显露出来了。

en: The composer is wrestling with the new music.
zh: 那位作曲家正在苦思冥想他的新曲子。

en: The writer is bringing out a new book next month.
zh: 作家下个月要出一本新书。

en: The writer is very popular because he expresses himself well.
zh: 那个作家很受欢迎，因为他很会表达。

en: That writer is well known all over the world.
zh: 那个作家闻名世界。

en: The writer is working on a new book.
zh: 那个作家正在写一本新书。

en: The writer is said to have studied at a university in Germany when young.
zh: 据说那个作家年轻时在德国上过大学。

en: The author killed himself in his study.
zh: 作者在书房里自杀了。

en: The author presented a copy of his latest book to me.
zh: 作者送了我一本他的新书。

en: The writer is well known to us.
zh: 那个作家我们都很熟悉。

en: The author described the murder case vividly.
zh: 作者把那桩谋杀案描写得活灵活现。

en: The writer is living in a log cabin.
zh: 那个作家住在一个小木屋里。

en: The writer is tackling the now new novel.
zh: 那个作家正在创作他的那部新小说。

en: The writer is very good at a dialog.
zh: 那个作家很擅长写对话。

en: The writer is very humorous.
zh: 那个作家非常幽默。

en: How long ago did the author die?
zh: 作者去世多久了？

en: The writer was descended from the Greek royal family.
zh: 那个作家是希腊王室的后裔。

en: The author is seventy, but he's no less productive than he was twenty years ago.
zh: 作者已经七十岁了，但产量还是跟二十年前一样高。

en: The author's name is familiar to us.
zh: 这个作者的名字我们听着挺耳熟的。

en: The writer has a parenthetic style.
zh: 这位作家的写作风格喜欢用插入语。

en: The author's mode of expression is very concise.
zh: 作者的表达方式非常简练。

en: The writer's latest novel is well worth reading.
zh: 这位作家的最新小说非常值得一读。

en: The writer's furniture is all shown in this museum.
zh: 这位作家用过的家具都在这家博物馆里展出。

en: The author translated the fairy tale into our mother tongue.
zh: 作者把这篇童话翻译成了我们的母语。

en: The recipe serves six people.
zh: 这个食谱是六人份的。

en: Let's descend the slope.
zh: 咱们下坡吧。

en: The treasure lay hidden for a long time.
zh: 这批宝藏被埋藏了很久。

en: In addition to about 30,000 yen, the wallet contained his driver's license.
zh: 钱包里除了有大约三万日元，还有他的驾照。

en: All the property will go to his daughter.
zh: 所有的财产都会留给他的女儿。

en: The property is mine.
zh: 这财产是我的。

en: The guilt lies with him.
zh: 责任在他。

en: The criminal became a Christian and turned over a new leaf.
zh: 那个罪犯成了基督徒，重新做人了。

en: The judge was grave and forbidding.
zh: 法官神情严肃，让人不敢接近。

en: And this is the judgment, that the light is come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the light; for their works were evil.
zh: 判决是这样的：光来到了世上，但人们因为自己干了坏事，爱黑暗胜过爱光。

en: The trial is not open to the public.
zh: 这次审判不公开进行。

en: The judge reversed the final decision.
zh: 法官推翻了最终判决。

en: The festival is held in the second week of January every year.
zh: 这个节日每年一月的第二周举行。

en: It is believed that the festival comes from the South Pacific islands.
zh: 据说这个节日源于南太平洋群岛。

en: The festival was far from dull.
zh: 那个节日一点也不无聊。

en: The fortress was secure from every kind of attack.
zh: 这座要塞固若金汤，能抵御各种攻击。

en: The earthquake which caused the disaster occurred in 1995.
zh: 导致那场灾难的地震发生在1995年。

en: The damage of the disaster has been enormous.
zh: 灾难造成的损失非常巨大。

en: After the disaster, there was scarcely any water left on the island.
zh: 灾难过后，岛上几乎没剩什么水了。

en: Whoever made that last comment, please leave now.
zh: 刚才最后说话的那个人，请现在离开。

en: Quite a few people turned out for the event.
zh: 来参加活动的人还挺多的。

en: That desert looks like the surface of the moon.
zh: 那片沙漠看起来就像月球表面。

en: In the desert we were independent of camels.
zh: 在沙漠里，我们不需要骆驼也能行。

en: Tell me how you got over such troubles?
zh: 告诉我你是怎么度过这些难关的？

en: Stir the mixture until it foams, then set it aside.
zh: 把混合物搅拌到起泡，然后放在一边。

en: You must overcome the difficulties.
zh: 你必须克服这些困难。

en: We need a spirit of enterprise to overcome the difficulty.
zh: 我们需要一种进取精神来克服困难。

en: At that time, she was a student at Yale.
zh: 那时候她还在耶鲁大学读书。

en: At that time, I was still awake.
zh: 那会儿我还醒着。

en: In those days, few people went to college.
zh: 在那个年代，没多少人能上大学。

en: I was very poor in those days.
zh: 那阵子我很穷。

en: Those black people have long been deprived of their rights.
zh: 那些黑人的权利长期以来一直被剥夺。

en: That dark coat does not match her dark skin.
zh: 那件深色外套跟她黝黑的皮肤不太搭。

en: She cuts a beautiful figure in that black suit.
zh: 她穿那套黑西装显得身材很好。

en: He cuts a handsome figure in that black suit.
zh: 他穿那身黑色西装看起来很帅。

en: Progress has been very slow indeed, so far as the social life of the people is concerned.
zh: 就人们的社会生活而言，进展确实非常缓慢。

en: The international conference was to be held in February this year.
zh: 国际会议原定在今年二月举行。

en: There's a checkpoint at the border where they look in your trunk.
zh: 边境有个检查站，他们会检查你的后备箱。

en: The Congressman broke the news of conspiracy and made no bones about taking drastic action against it.
zh: 那位国会议员揭露了阴谋，并直言不讳地表示要采取严厉行动。

en: Introducing democratic ideas into that country will be a slow process.
zh: 向那个国家引入民主思想会是一个缓慢的过程。

en: The country declared war against its neighbor.
zh: 那个国家向邻国宣战了。

en: The country is aiming at decreasing its imports.
zh: 那个国家正致力于减少进口。

en: The country is trying hard to make up for her trade deficit.
zh: 那个国家正努力弥补贸易逆差。

en: That country broke off diplomatic relations with the United States.
zh: 那个国家与美国断绝了外交关系。

en: The country advanced in civilization.
zh: 那个国家的文明进步了。

en: That country is about twice as large as Japan.
zh: 那个国家的面积大约是日本的两倍。

en: The country appealed to Japan for help.
zh: 那个国家向日本求助。

en: The country kept faith with her ally.
zh: 那个国家对盟友信守承诺。

en: What does this word mean?
zh: 这个词是什么意思？

en: The words were spelled wrong.
zh: 这些词拼错了。

en: How do you spell the word?
zh: 这个词怎么拼？

en: His misspelling of that word eliminated him from the contest.
zh: 他因为拼错那个词被淘汰了。

en: Will you please explain to me the exact meaning of the word?
zh: 你能不能给我解释下这个词到底是什么意思？

en: What is the precise meaning of the word?
zh: 这个词的准确含义是什么？

en: Find out the meaning of the word for yourself.
zh: 那个词的意思你自己去查查。

en: The accent of the word is on the second syllable.
zh: 这个词的重音在第二个音节。

en: Do you know the French equivalent of the word?
zh: 你知道这个词对应的法语怎么说吗？

en: The word has several meanings.
zh: 这个词有好几个意思。

en: I have no idea what has become of her since.
zh: 自那以后，我就不知道她怎么样了。

en: After that, he went home.
zh: 之后，他就回家了。

en: I have never heard of him since.
zh: 从那以后，我就没再听说过他的消息。

en: Thereafter we heard no more from him.
zh: 之后我们就再没他的音信了。

en: I never spoke to him after that.
zh: 自那之后我就没跟他说话了。

en: There followed a prolonged silence.
zh: 接着是一段很长时间的沉默。

en: Do you have anything to do after that?
zh: 之后你还有事吗？

en: The patron appreciates genuine antiques.
zh: 这位老主顾很赏识真古董。

en: And soon after I procured Xenophon's Memorable Things of Socrates, in which there are many instances of the same method.
zh: 不久后我弄到了色诺芬写的《回忆苏格拉底》，里面有很多用同样方法的例子。

en: After that he began to enjoy life again and gradually recovered.
zh: 那之后他重新开始享受生活，并逐渐康复了。

en: After that, many live in special homes for the aged where their children and grandchildren can come to visit them.
zh: 那之后，很多人住进了专门的养老院，儿孙们可以常去探望。

en: You know the rest of the story.
zh: 后面的事你都知道了。

en: Then Mike tells Hiroshi to fasten his seat belt.
zh: 然后迈克让博史系好安全带。

en: Soon after that, I began to fall asleep.
zh: 没过多久，我就开始想睡觉了。

en: Then Hawking wanted to finish his degree, work at Cambridge, and keep on living.
zh: 后来霍金想拿到学位，在剑桥工作，并继续活下去。

en: Then I slipped out the card. No water leaks out because no air can come in; the rim is too close to the table for that.
zh: 接着我抽出了卡片。水没流出来，因为空气进不去；杯口离桌面太近了。

en: After this he went down to Capernaum with his mother and brothers and his disciples.
zh: 这事以后，他跟他母亲、兄弟还有门徒一起去了迦百农。

en: The customer's complaint was about a sensitive issue.
zh: 客户投诉的是个挺敏感的问题。

en: The employer imposed a heavy task on them.
zh: 雇主给他们派了个很重的活儿。

en: Don't waste any more time responding to that customer.
zh: 别再浪费时间给那个客户回消息了。

en: The lake is four miles across.
zh: 这个湖有四英里宽。

en: The lake is the deepest in Japan.
zh: 这个湖是日本最深的。

en: The lake can be reached in half an hour by bus.
zh: 坐公交半小时就能到那个湖。

en: The lake is large and beautiful.
zh: 那个湖又大又漂亮。

en: The lake is notorious for its contamination.
zh: 那个湖因为污染严重而臭名昭著。

en: The lake is five kilometers round.
zh: 那个湖周长五公里。

en: The lake is ten miles about.
zh: 那个湖周长大约十英里。

en: The lake supplies the city with water.
zh: 那个湖给全城供水。

en: The lake is made not by nature but by art.
zh: 那个湖不是天然的，是人工挖出来的。

en: How deep is that lake?
zh: 那个湖有多深？

en: I don't know how deep the lake is.
zh: 我不知道那个湖有多深。

en: The ice on the lake is too thin to bear your weight.
zh: 湖上的冰太薄了，禁不起你的重量。

en: The lake is deepest at this spot.
zh: 这儿是湖里最深的地方。

en: The lake is deep at this point.
zh: 这块儿湖水很深。

en: The beauty of the lake is beyond description.
zh: 那个湖美得没法形容。

en: The beauty of the lake was beyond description.
zh: 那个湖当时美得没法用语言表达。

en: The water of the lake is very cold.
zh: 湖里的水特别冰。

en: The water in the lake is cool.
zh: 湖里的水很凉快。

en: The lake abounds with fish.
zh: 那个湖里鱼很多。

en: What is the depth of the lake?
zh: 那个湖有多深？

en: The lake supplies water to the village.
zh: 那个湖给村子供水。

en: The door will be painted tomorrow.
zh: 门明天刷漆。

en: The door was locked from the inside.
zh: 门是从里面反锁的。

en: The door was locked from the outside.
zh: 门是从外面锁上的。

en: The door wouldn't shut.
zh: 门关不上。

en: The door will not open; the lock must be out of order.
zh: 门打不开，锁肯定是坏了。

en: The lonely man derives pleasure from observing ants.
zh: 那个孤独的男人靠观察蚂蚁来找乐子。

en: The orphan wept with grief over his misfortune.
zh: 那个孤儿为自己的不幸痛苦地哭泣。

en: The orphan was fostered by the wealthy man.
zh: 那个孤儿被一个有钱人收养了。

en: The old castle is in a sad state.
zh: 那座旧城堡破败不堪。

en: The old castle lay in ruins.
zh: 那座旧城堡已经成了废墟。

en: The old castle stands on the hill.
zh: 那座旧城堡矗立在山上。

en: The old house was in bad shape.
zh: 那座老房子破破烂烂的。

en: The old cottage has a certain charm about it.
zh: 那座旧小屋有种独特的魅力。

en: The old clock is still in use.
zh: 那个旧钟还在用呢。

en: The old shrine used to stand there.
zh: 那里以前有一座旧神龛。

en: The old belief is still widely current.
zh: 那个旧观念现在依然很流行。

en: The old proverb still holds good in our modern society.
zh: 那个古老的谚语在现代社会依然适用。

en: It was decided that the old building be pulled down.
zh: 决定把那栋旧楼给拆了。

en: The old building was broken down.
zh: 那栋旧楼被拆毁了。

en: The old bridge is in danger of collapse.
zh: 那座老桥有坍塌的危险。

en: The old house was burned to ashes.
zh: 那座老房子被烧成了灰烬。
